text.data: Dragonkeeper: Okay! Shall I teach you about how to take care of the dragons?[end]
Please tell me. No thanks.[end1]D
Dragonkeeper: Okay! Here you go!! This is a present from me! He's very shy, so take good care of it.[end]C
Come here!![end]L
Look closely at the dragons. Their faces are saying they're hungry. Dragons can get hungry at anytime. If you feed them a lot they'll calm down.[end]H
Hey! Here's some food!![end]C
Come here!![end]D
Dragons will eat anything. Swords, medicine, anything!![end]B

But! Depending on what they eat they'll develop quickly or slowly. How much of something you feed them is the key!! If you don't think about their nutritional balance, they won't become excellent dragons!![end]D
Do you understand so far?[end]
Yes No[end1]O

Okay, one more time then! You ready?
Dragons can get hungry at anytime. They'll eat anything, whether they like it or not.[end]O
Oh! It looks like they calmed down. I'll continue while I still can... Don't startle them.[end]I

I'll tell you something important. It's about the strength of everybody's skills, like yours and Matelite's. The strength of everyone's skills and their types level up alongside their dragons' strength![end]T
The stronger the dragons become the stronger everyone will be. But you must be careful when using Formation.[end]O
Okay! One more time![end]A
And then... I'll tell you a secret over there!![end]S
Stay!![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]... Is there somebody you like?[end]I
I see... well... I think you'll understand this feeling soon enough...[end]T
Then you might understand how the dragons feel too...[end]G
Give this dragon a name.[end]O
Oh...[end][0x0]

The dragons might get jealous if you pay too much attention to just one...
And if you don't show enough affection to one of them, it might become timid... Be careful.[end]Y
Yep!! The more you think about the dragons the more you'll become emotionally attached to them. You'll definitely become able to express your feelings much more easily.[end]T
This is all that I can teach you. Okay, [character][0x1]?[end]D

Dragons have hearts, just like you, [character][0x1].
They laugh, and they get angry. They can also be sad, and they can also love. To make matters worse... they also overeat, and they catch colds too... Make sure to take good care of them.[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1], you might be able to become a legendary dragonkeeper like me too...[end]D
Don't give up! Here's a present from me! He's shy, so take care of him.[end]O
Okay then! You can do whatever you want now![end]D
Dragonkeeper: Are you going back inside?[end]D
Dragonkeeper: Are you going back inside for a while?[end][end]
